entry.title: Managing Recurring Order Account Details
entry.content:
It has come to our attention that it is difficult to alter existing Recurring Orders.  Alterations are required when customers are leaving on vacation, want to change the number or type of coffee they are ordering, or simply need to update credit card expiry dates. 

The very first thing you need to do is LOGIN to your STORE ACCOUNT by clicking LOGIN at the TOP RIGHT of the Home Page and enter your details.

In order to make altering Recurring Order details MUCH easier, I've added a link at the BOTTOM RIGHT in the FOOTER of every page on our website called "Manage Recurring Orders".

When you click on this link you will be taken to your Recurring Orders Management Page where you can click on the BLUE links.  On the right hand side of the page is one that indicates MANAGE, where you can update or alter any aspect of your recurring orders.

NOTE:  When logging into your STORE ACCOUNT first, you can access the Recurring Orders and the Loyalty Rewards Apps.  The RECURRING ORDERS link is at the top left of every page, and the LOYALTY REWARDS widget link is dead centre at the bottom of the every page.

I hope this is a helpful addition to the website and makes some of the annoying things about e-commerce vanish.

entry.title: Buying Online Using Coupon Codes
entry.summary:
When you join our Loyalty Rewards Coffee Club your rewards pile up quickly.  You can now shop for your favourite coffee, tea, equipment or anything else we sell online and your $10 discount will automatically be applied to your purchase when you proceed to checkout.

More
entry.content:
Buying online using Coupon Codes

 

  • Go to northroast.com and select the “North Roast Rewards” tab at the bottom of the screen. 
  • Select “Log in” and enter the email address and password associated with your Rewards Account.
  • Select “Login”.
  • Select “Use Points”
  • Select $10 Off Online Orders “Get Code”
  • Select “Apply to Checkout”

 

You can now shop for your favourite coffee, tea, equipment or anything else we sell online ( *EXCEPT GIFT CARDS) and your $10 discount will automatically be applied to your purchase when you proceed to checkout.

 

You will also receive an email with your Discount Code if you’d like to save the code for later use.

 

*When you purchase online please remember that you can choose to pick up your order at our Roastery on Progress Avenue or have your order delivered to your home or office if located in Kingston Ontario...Free

entry.title: Signing Up For Loyalty Rewards
entry.summary:
When you join our North Roast Loyalty Rewards Program the BEANS add up quickly!  Use your points when you purchase anything we sell online.  Check your points balance from your computer, and no need to carry around a plastic card, an email address is all you need.

More
entry.content:
SIGNING UP FOR LOYALTY REWARDS

 

 

Signing up for Loyalty Rewards is easy!  Follow these instructions and you'll be well on your way to receiving Gift Cards usable at Multatuli Coffee Merchants or at northroast.com .

 

  1. Go to northroast.com and select "North Roast Rewards” tab at the bottom of the screen.
  2. Select "Create Store Account to Join"
  3. Fill in the information including a valid email address.  The email address is the most important piece of information since it is where your rewards will be sent.
  4. Select "Create"
  5. You are now registered for Loyalty Rewards and you will receive a welcome bonus of 100 beans!
  6. Now every time you make a purchase, indicate your email address and your purchase will be credited to your Loyalty Account.  Welcome!

 

 

*You need to write down or remember the LOGIN information for this account because you must check you points balance to redeem rewards.

If you forget your password, there is a “FORGOT PASSWORD” option from the login page.
